items.title: Email Sales Prospecting – With The High Value Email
items.headline: Crack the Email Code  & Start Connecting with HIGH VALUE Leads  !!!
objectives_summary: Uncover new business sales prospect – FAST Start closing more sales now… Finally Crack the Email Prospecting Code! Let’s face it, email marketing simply does not work for most people in sales.  Almost every method being taught is simply another rehashed version of the same old stuff. – And None of it Works! Learn to use this powerful 3x5 email marketing sales strategy and start seeing results.  Have people picking up the phone to call you & Separate yourself from the competition. Do something different and dramatically increase your sales leads, good fit prospects and finally get in front of real decision makers…NOW!
